root.name: Painterboy
root.description: OverviewPainterboy is an action game developed by Chart Top Design and published by Tikkurila for the Commodore 64 platform. Painterboy is a Finnish advergame that is designed to represent a paint company called Tikkurila. The game features animated characters that Tikkurila used in TV commercials.Painterboy was only available to purchase through mail order.
